title.native: 时光代理人 第二季

description:
Cheng Xiaoshi by chance meets Lu Guang, a person possessing super powers, and awakens to his own special ability. In order to save the Time Photo Studio which is on the verge of closing down, the two of them start to cooperate in using their super powers to enter photos of customers to complete their commissions.

However, the appearance of a mysterious killer shatters the peace, Lu Guang's condition is still unknown and Qiao Ling has also become entangled in the conspiracy. Faced with all this, how will Cheng Xiaoshi solve the situation?

(Source: bilibili, translated)
synonyms: ข้ามเวลาพิชิตภารกิจ ภาค 2

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Body Swapping
tags.description: Centers around individuals swapping bodies with one another.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Photography
tags.description: Centers around the use of cameras to capture photos.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Achromatic
tags.description: Contains animation that is primarily done in black and white.

node.description:
__Birth Name:__ Atsushi Shirakawa (白川篤史) 

A Japanese music composer from Tokyo, Japan born in 1971. He worked in the Nihon Falcom Corporation as one of the members of Falcom Sound Team J.D.K.. During his time with Falcom, he has composed much music for Falcom games, most notably Brandish.  Having known Makoto Shinkai as a co-worker in Minori he has composed music for Shinkai's works since She and Her Cat. He is perhaps best known for creating the soundtracks for Shinkai's subsequent works, Voices of a Distant Star, The Place Promised in Our Early Days, 5 Centimeters Per Second, and most recently, Children who Chase Lost Voices from Deep Below.

[Website](https://kentwatari.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kent_watari) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/qura_kw) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@kentwatari/)

Japanese drummer and music producer. Known by his stage name "av4ln"

[Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/9099524) | [Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/1734931240) | [Wiki (cn)](https://zh.wikipedia.org/zh-hant/%E6%9D%8E%E6%97%8E)

Carly Lee is the Vice Chairman and COO of Bilibili. She is responsible for the overall operation of the platform business, content ecological construction, commercialization and strategic investment, market branding, etc.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ccarrollbeard) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/colleen.clinkenbeardvoiceactress)

An American voice actress and theatre actress, working mainly in the commercial and dubbing industries. She has also served as ADR director, line producer, and script writer for several anime titles for Funimation.

She gave birth to her first son, Rhodes Vandelo Carroll, on September 4, 2014.
Audio and ADR Engineer affiliated with Crunchyroll
